titlStmt.titl: Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation

citation.biblCit: Peery, Rhiannon, 2021, "Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation", https://doi.org/10.7939/DVN/A7BWB8, UAL Dataverse, V1

titlStmt.titl: Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation

stdyInfo.abstract: These data include files needed for or generated from phylogenetic, mutation rate, reciprocal best hits, and population genomics analyses.
stdyInfo.notes: Here, we report new stem tissue transcriptome resources developed for lodgepole and jack pines subjected to biotic stresses from inoculation with two fungal pathogens.

citation.biblCit: Rhiannon M. Peery, Chandra H. McAllister, Catherine I. Cullingham, Elizabeth L. Mahon, Adriana Arango-Velez, and Janice E.K. Cooke. Comparative genomics of the chitinase gene family in lodgepole and jack pines: contrasting responses to biotic threats and landscape level investigation of genetic differentiation. Botany. 99(6): 355-378. https://doi.org/10.1139/cjb-2020-0125
